WINTER 2022 An inside look for employers
Livongo is now part of Teladoc Health, the global leader in virtual care Healthy perspectives leading into 2022 As we look to the year ahead, it’s the perfect time to assess where we are today and plan for a successful 2022. For example, we’ve all seen how today’s consumers are expecting more from virtual care than ever before, so we’re excited to share our Virtual Care Transformation Model. This industry-first roadmap uses your organization’s resources, priorities and goals to help design a comprehensive virtual services plan for your employees. Read on to learn about its development and to help shape a path forward for your organization.
Don’t forget, February is American Heart Month and a great reminder to us all that heart disease continues to be the leading cause of death worldwide. 1 Read on to hear how you can help your members manage their heart health.
As always, thank you for being a great partner. Here’s to a healthy and successful 2022!
Amy Cosler Senior Vice President, Client Success Teladoc Health

IN THE NEWS
Teladoc Health Launches first-of-its kind chronic care condition solution <[[https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2022/02/17/2387399/0/en/Teladoc-Health-Launches-Chronic-Care-Complete-As-First-Unified-Chronic-Condition-Management-Experience.html]]> Today, we announced the launch of Chronic Care Complete, a first-of-its-kind chronic care condition solution to help individuals improve health outcomes while living with multiple chronic conditions. The solution is designed to deliver a unified, comprehensive experience through connected devices, personalized health signals, physician oversight, expert coaching and integrated mental health care.
